title: hELabArade buddhiya krSNayyage
sahitya:
hELabArade buddhiya krSNayyage


caraNam 1    gaTyAgi kadavanikkinAvella koTTigeyaloragiddevu naTTa 
naDuvinallidda cikka makkaLella kaTTa kaDeyaliTTane gOpyamma
    caraNam 2    hAlu kaLLanendu ninna magana hAdighOgadiddEva hAlu 
sungava bEDi tOLaDDa gaTTida bALa hAvaLigAramma gOpyamma
    caraNam 3    mosaru kaLLanendu ninna magana pesaru koLLavE tAye 
hosa hengaLaranapahAsvaya mADuva hasu maganivanEnamma gOpyamma
    caraNam 4    sarasarane bandu ninna maga horasu Eri kuLitu puruSarillada 
vELya havaNisi tA hondi sarasavADidanamma gOpyamma
    caraNam 5    baTTa kucada mEle beTTanUri muTTi muTTi nODuta gaTyAgi 
nA bEka hiDiya bEkendare taTTane mAyavAdanamma gOpyamma
    caraNam 6    cikka makkaLanella hiDitandu jaTTige kallu kaTTi nakku 
nalivAga hiDiya bEkendare takkaisi koNDanamma gOpyamma
    caraNam 7    aTTuLi ghanavAge I gOkula biTTu hOdEve tAyi gaTyAgi
I buddhiya mADadante I krSNana daNDisamma gOpyamma
    caraNam 8    ALIkondondu mAta hELi nIvu Adikombire krSNanana Aluva 
nimma gaNDarige nAcikeyilla gULIbiTTide nimmanu strIyaranu
    caraNam 9    puNyavandare nIvu krSNana nitya kaNNInali kANuviri 
saNNavanendu shrI purandara viTTalage anyAya nuDiyadire nAriyare
